LanguageData.RecipeAburiBinUnlocked_Log: You have unlocked the recipe [Seared vial]! (P.S. This is not an error :D)
LanguageData.RecipeAburiBinUnlocked_Text: To unravel the cause of death of this narehate of a witch, you turned your gaze to the glass fragments scattered beside the corpse. These fragments appear to have come from a glass vial that shattered due to heat.\n\nYou have some novel ideas about why one would heat an empty vial!
LanguageData.RecipeSimpleSpearUnlocked_Log: You have unlocked the recipe [Simple spear]! (P.S. This is not an error :D)
LanguageData.RecipeSimpleSpearUnlocked_Text: As the witch factor became recognized, you followed your primal instincts and devised a method for making a "Simple spear" to extend the reach of a gladius.
LanguageData.Manosaba_ResearchUnlocked_Text: Through various recent anomalies, you have gained new insights. You have discovered the witch factor, and can now undertake the following research projects:\n\n - Methods of detecting witches
LanguageData.Manosaba_SurgicalInspection_Text: {DOCTOR_labelShort} performed a detailed surgical inspection on {PATIENT_labelShort}.\n\nThe results are disturbing: {PATIENT_labelShort} does indeed carry the witch factor. Although the level of erosion is currently shallow, {PATIENT_labelShort} will one day become a witch who brings calamity to the colony.
LanguageData.Manosaba_LetterText_TurnIntoNarehate: {PAWN_labelShort} has completely transformed into a witch, becoming a narehate driven solely by murderous intent.
LanguageData.MentalBreakFactor_Recovery: {0} has calmed down from the rampage caused by the witch factor.\nShe is no longer attempting to kill {1}, for now.
LanguageData.Manosaba_Incident_YukiVisitor_letterText:
A young woman of unknown origin has arrived at your colony.

She calls herself "{YUKI}", and her visit seems to have some hidden purpose.

You can talk to her to learn more.
LanguageData.Manosaba_PatchUndead_teleportLeaveOnDeat: Having sustained fatal injuries, {YUKI} has left the colony.
LanguageData.Manosaba_Message_KilledByTredecim: {0} was killed by Trēdecim due to carrying the witch factor.\nHowever, the witch factor itself has not left the colony.
LanguageData.Manosaba_Message_NoResurrect: The witch {0} has been thoroughly killed by Trēdecim and cannot be resurrected.
LanguageData.Manosaba_NarehateTargetInvalid: {0} is not a narehate of a witch
LanguageData.Manosaba_Sabbat_NoMajyoinshi: {0} does not have the witch factor
LanguageData.Manosaba_Message_PartRegen: {0_nameDef}'s {1} has regenerated due to {0_pronoun} witch factor!
LanguageData.Manosaba_AbilityAdd_CannotBeYuki: {0} cannot be granted the witch factor.
LanguageData.Manosaba_AbilityRemove_DoesntHave: {0} does not have the witch factor.
LanguageData.Manosaba_AbilityRemove_CannotBeYuki: {0} cannot have the witch factor removed.
